text:
="preserve">The Cheetah is a fictional character, created by William Moulton Marston. She appears in DC Comics publications and related media, commonly as a major villain to the superhero Wonder Woman.
In 2009, The Cheetah was ranked as IGN's 69th Greatest Comic Book Villain of All Time. Cheetah has superhuman speed, reaction time, strength and durability to an unknown degree. Her sense of smell has also been enhanced and she is able to see in the dark.
Kristen Wiig will play Dr. Barbara Ann Minerva, a.k.a Cheetah, in "Wonder Woman 1984", the 8th movie in the DC Extended Universe.
